data.name: files
data.description: Represents the selected file(s) in the input field. Can be used to retrieve uploaded files.

data.name: size
data.description: Controls the size of the file input, affecting its padding and overall dimensions.

data.name: variant
data.description: Defines the visual style of the input field. Options include bordered, underline, and flat.

data.name: helperText
data.description: Displays additional information below the file input to guide the user.

data.name: rounded
data.description: Defines the border-radius of the checkbox. Options: "none", "sm", "md", "lg", "full".

data.name: reset
data.description: If true, resets all default library styles, allowing for full custom styling.

data.name: labelClasses
data.description: Applies custom CSS classes to style the label of the file input.

data.name: wrapperClasses
data.description: Allows custom styling for the main wrapper container of the file input.
